entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mackenzie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -14.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mackenzie Airport 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -14.9°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -17.0°C
Wind: S 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
